mapper.select: /* USE : PosServiceMapper.getPrintTypeList */ SELECT tcp.PRT_CLASS_CD AS VALUE, tcp.PRT_CLASS_NM AS NAME FROM TB_CM_PRINT tcp ORDER BY tcp.PRT_CLASS_CD

/* USE : PosServiceMapper.getPrintCodeList */ SELECT tcpd.PRT_CD, tcpc.CONTENT, tcpc.CONTENT_EN, tcpc.CONTENT_CN, tcpc.CONTENT_JP, tcpc.SAMPL_YN FROM TB_CM_PRINT_DTL tcpd LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_PRINT_CODE tcpc ON tcpd.PRT_CD = tcpc.PRT_CD WHERE tcpd.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} ORDER BY tcpd.DISP_SEQ
mapper.insert:
/* USE : PosServiceMapper.savePosTemplate */
MERGE INTO TB_HQ_PRINT_TEMPL thpt USING DUAL ON ( thpt.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpt.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} AND thpt.TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'H' AND thpt.TEMPLT_CD = #{templtCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET thpt.TEMPLT_NM = #{templtNm},
thpt.PRT_FORM = #{prtForm},
thpt.PRT_EN_FORM = #{prtEnForm},
thpt.PRT_CN_FORM = #{prtCnForm},
thpt.PRT_JP_FORM = #{prtJpForm},
thpt.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, thpt.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, TEMPLT_NM,
PRT_FORM,
PRT_EN_FORM,
PRT_CN_FORM,
PRT_JP_FORM,
REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, #{prtClassCd}, 'H', ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(MAX(thpt.TEMPLT_CD) + 1, '000')), '001') FROM TB_HQ_PRINT_TEMPL thpt WHERE thpt.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpt.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} AND thpt.TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'H' ), #{templtNm},
#{prtForm},
#{prtEnForm},
#{prtCnForm},
#{prtJpForm},
#{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRINT_TEMPL tmpt USING DUAL ON ( tmpt.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmpt.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} AND tmpt.TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'S' AND tmpt.TEMPLT_CD = #{templtCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmpt.TEMPLT_NM = #{templtNm},
tmpt.PRT_FORM = #{prtForm},
tmpt.PRT_EN_FORM = #{prtEnForm},
tmpt.PRT_CN_FORM = #{prtCnForm},
tmpt.PRT_JP_FORM = #{prtJpForm},
tmpt.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tmpt.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, TEMPLT_NM,
PRT_FORM,
PRT_EN_FORM,
PRT_CN_FORM,
PRT_JP_FORM,
REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{prtClassCd}, 'S', ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(MAX(tmpt.TEMPLT_CD) + 1, '000')), '001') FROM TB_MS_PRINT_TEMPL tmpt WHERE tmpt.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmpt.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} AND tmpt.TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'S' ), #{templtNm},
#{prtForm},
#{prtEnForm},
#{prtCnForm},
#{prtJpForm},
#{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRINT tmp USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, #{prtClassCd} AS PRT_CLASS_CD, #{templtRegFg} AS TEMPLT_REG_FG, #{templtCd} AS TEMPLT_CD, PRT_FORM, PRT_EN_FORM, PRT_CN_FORM, PRT_JP_FORM, #{modDt} AS REG_DT, #{modId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRINT_TEMPL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} AND TEMPLT_CD = #{templtCd} AND TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'H' ) B ON ( tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PRT_CLASS_CD, tmp.TEMPLT_REG_FG, tmp.TEMPLT_CD, tmp.PRT_FORM, tmp.PRT_EN_FORM, tmp.PRT_CN_FORM, tmp.PRT_JP_FORM, tmp.REG_DT, tmp.REG_ID, tmp.MOD_DT, tmp.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PRT_CLASS_CD, B.TEMPLT_REG_FG, B.TEMPLT_CD, B.PRT_FORM, B.PRT_EN_FORM, B.PRT_CN_FORM, B.PRT_JP_FORM, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmp.TEMPLT_REG_FG = B.TEMPLT_REG_FG, tmp.TEMPLT_CD = B.TEMPLT_CD, tmp.PRT_FORM = B.PRT_FORM, tmp.PRT_EN_FORM = B.PRT_EN_FORM, tmp.PRT_CN_FORM = B.PRT_CN_FORM, tmp.PRT_JP_FORM = B.PRT_JP_FORM, tmp.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, tmp.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID
mapper.insert: /* USE : PosServiceMapper.insertPosTemplatePrint */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRINT tmp USING DUAL ON ( tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, PRT_FORM, PRT_EN_FORM, PRT_CN_FORM, PRT_JP_FORM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{prtClassCd}, #{templtRegFg}, #{templtCd}, '', '', '', '', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.update:
/* USE : PosServiceMapper.updatePosTemplatePrint */
UPDATE TB_HQ_PRINT SET
TEMPLT_REG_FG = #{templtRegFg}, TEMPLT_CD = #{templtCd},
PRT_FORM = #{prtForm}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd}
UPDATE TB_MS_PRINT SET
TEMPLT_REG_FG = #{templtRegFg}, TEMPLT_CD = #{templtCd},
PRT_FORM = #{prtForm},
PRT_EN_FORM = #{prtEnForm},
PRT_CN_FORM = #{prtCnForm},
PRT_JP_FORM = #{prtJpForm},
MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd}
mapper.select: /* USE : PosTemplateMapper.getPrintCodeNm */ SELECT PRT_NM FROM TB_CM_PRINT_CODE WHERE PRT_CD = #{prtCd}
